EhViewer

è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª E-Hentai Android å¹³å°çš„æµè§ˆå™¨ã€‚

An E-Hentai Application for Android.

Screenshot

Build

Windows

> git clone https://github.com/xiaojieonly/Ehviewer_CN_SXJ.git
> cd EhViewer
> gradlew app:assembleDebug

Linux

$ git clone https://github.com/xiaojieonly/Ehviewer_CN_SXJ.git
$ cd EhViewer
$ ./gradlew app:assembleDebug
